meanings.definition: In a showy or extravagant manner
meanings.sent1: She danced flamboyantly across the stage, catching everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The peacock strutted flamboyantly, displaying its vibrant feathers.
meanings.sent3: The birthday party was decorated flamboyantly with bright balloons and streamers.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed flamboyantly through the empty hall, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks lit up the sky flamboyantly, painting it with bursts of color.

meanings.sent1: The flamboyantly dressed clown made the children laugh with his silly antics.
meanings.sent2: The artist's flamboyantly painted masterpiece drew crowds to the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The parrot's flamboyantly colored feathers stood out in the dull forest.
meanings.sent4: Her flamboyantly decorated room reflected her vibrant personality.
meanings.sent5: The flamboyantly decorated cake was the centerpiece of the party, dazzling all the guests.

meanings.definition: With a flamboyant style or flair
meanings.sent1: He sang flamboyantly, hitting high notes with ease.
meanings.sent2: The fashion designer dressed flamboyantly, always turning heads.
meanings.sent3: The chef flamboyantly garnished the dish with colorful herbs.
meanings.sent4: The actor delivered his lines flamboyantly, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent5: The dancer moved flamboyantly across the stage, mesmerizing the spectators.
